page.title: 11LEISURE IN THE DOBWALLS AREA
page.content: PEOPLE PURSUE A WIDE RANGE OF LEISURE ACTIVITIES. ORGANISED ACTIVITIES CAN BE FOUND MAINLY OUTSIDE THE BLOCK, IN LISKEARD, PLYMOUTH OR ST.AUSTELL. IF YOU TRAVEL THEN YOU CAN ENJOY ANY SORT OF ENTERTAINMENT OR SPORT. IF NOT THEN YOU HAVE TO BE MORE SELF RELIANT. THERE IS A FOOTBALL CLUB IN DOBWALLS, A BADMINTON CLUB (WITH MANY MEMBERS COMING FROM OUTSIDE THE BLOCK), AND 2 SNOOKER CLUBS. THERE IS A GARDENING CLUB AT ST.PINNOCK. BOTH CHURCH AND CHAPEL FULFIL THE NEEDS OF SOME ADHERENTS AS AN ENJOYABLE ACTIVITY APART FROM WORK. OTHERS ARE ACTIVE POLITICALLY. OTHERS FIND SATISFACTION IN WORKING ON THEIR HOUSES OR CARS. THERE IS ONLY 1 PUB IN THE BLOCK. OCCASIONALLY DANCES TAKE PLACE IN THE MEMORIAL HALL.
